topic.title: Overview
topic.shortdesc: Light SIMD is a light-weight C++ template library for generic SIMD-based programming.

body.p: Light SIMD is easy-to-use, efficient, and portable.

ul.li: Generic interfaces for writing portable (i.e. platform-independent) codes.
Support of a rich set of math functions, including arithmetics, transcendental math, and logical operations.
Highly optimized codes for linear algebra on small matrices.
Light weight classes and always-inlined functions, which incur zero run-time overhead (in release mode).
Extensively tested with hundreds of unit testing cases.
